page.title: 09DYNAMO THEATRE GROUP HAVANT
page.content: The town of Havant has it's own acting group founded in 1980. Although the theatre is fairly small it has a couple of acting groups that take drama seriously.Dynamo is a group of children aged 12-18,they are directed by Mr.A.Bowker,Mr.F.Hunwick and Mrs Wilcox. Dynamo is an anagram of Monday which is the night they meet,at 5:15- 7:15pm. Their productions have been: Murder in the Cathedral,Jesus Christ Superstar, Oh What a Lovely War, Witness to the Prosecution,Alternative Channel,Sir Gwaine and the Green Knight and Definately Eric Geddis.They are now working on their next show, Sweeny Todd's Shock and Roll show.The parents run a committee which handle all money aspects.Each year they play a game of cricket against another group of actors called The Bench.
